Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static float aoaHwa_calcCompIdx ( uint16_t  dopplerIdx,
uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
uint32_t  numTxAnt 
)
static

Description
this function calculates doppler compensation index for a given Doppler index of the object. It first converts Doppler index to the signed value and then divides by number of Tx antennas (number TDM MIMO Tx antennas). The type of return value is float.

Parameters
[in]dopplerIdxDoppler index
[in]numDopplerBinsNumber of Doppler bins
[in]numTxAntNumber of Tx Antennas
Returns
Doppler compensation index

Description
The function waits for 2D FFT single bin data to be transfered to the output buffer. This is a blocking function. The function polls for EDMA transfer completion.

Parameters

Return values

Error- <0

Definition at line 745 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static uint32_t AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev ( uint32_t  objInstartIdx,
uint32_t  numObjIn,
uint16_t *  azimFFTAbsPtr,
uint16_t *  azimFFTPtr,
uint16_t *  elevFFTPtr,
AOAHwaObj *  aoaHwaObj,
uint32_t  objOutIdx 
)
static

Description
Function calculates x/y/z coordinates of the objects detected by CFAR DPU. The number of output objects may be larger than input if multiobject beam forming is enabled, and more than one objects are detected at the same range/doppler bin.

Parameters
[in]objInstartIdxStarting index in the input object detection list
[in]numObjInNumber of objects detected by CFAR DPU
[in]azimFFTAbsPtrPointer to azimuth FFT log2 magnitude outputs of detected objects. The data are laid out as uint16_t type array x[numObjIn][azimuthFFTSize]
[in]azimFFTPtrPointer to azimuth antennas FFT complex outputs of detected objects. The data are laid out as cmplx16ImRe_t type array x[numObjIn][azimuthFFTSize]
[in]elevFFTPtrPointer to elevation antennas FFT complex outputs of detected objects The data are laid out as cmplx16ImRe_t type array x[numObjIn][azimuthFFTSize]
[in]aoaHwaObjPointer to AoAProc DPU internal data Object
[in]objOutIdxIndex to the next object in the output list
Return values
objOutIdxNumber of detected objects in the output list

Definition at line 1438 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinInp_EDMA ( HWA_Handle  hwaHandle,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *  res,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *  DPParams,
uint32_t  srcBuffAddr,
uint32_t  dstBuffAddr,
uint32_t  numIterations,
bool  forAzimuthHeatMap 
)
static

Description
The function configures input EDMA for single bin 2D-FFT computation using HWA. It configures EDMA to copy data from 1D-FFT radar cube matrix to HWA memory for single bin 2D-FFT calculation. The radar cube matrix format must be defined as DPIF_RADARCUBE_FORMAT_1. The EDMA is configured to copy 1D-FFT antenna symbols of desired range bin into HWA memory and trigger HWA to execute 2D-FFT computation. The data copy is done per trigger event. The EDMA is configured to increment source address to the next range bin. The function configures EDMA to run in one of the two modes: a) to compute 2D-FFT zero Doppler symbols for azimuth heatmap display, where the chain of input EDMA+HWA FFT+output EDMA is triggered with a single event to run in the loop and compute zero Doppler 2D FFT symbols for all range bins, or b) to compute 2D-FFT symbols for all detected objects where the EDMA source address is reconfigured by R4F for each detected object according to its range index.

Parameters
[in]hwaHandleHandle to HWA
[in]resPointer to hardware resources structure
[in]DPParamsPointer to profile parameters
[in]srcBuffAddrAddress of the 1D-FFT radar cube matrix
[in]dstBuffAddrAddress of HWA memory
[in]numIterationsNUmber of iterations
[in]forAzimuthHeatMaptrue: use for azimuth heatmap, false: use for detected points
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 245 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinOut_EDMA ( DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *  res,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *  DPParams,
uint32_t  srcBuffPtr,
uint32_t  dstBuffPtr,
uint32_t  numIterations,
bool  chainEnable 
)
static

Description
The function configures output EDMA for single bin 2D-FFT computation using HWA. It configures EDMA to copy 2D-FFT antenna symbols at desired Doppler bin from the HWA memory to the output buffer in local R4F memory.

Parameters
[in]resPointer to hardware resources
[in]DPParamsPointer to static configuration parameters
[in]srcBuffPtrSource buffer address, points to zero bin of 2D FFT output in HWA memory. THe source address is incremented
[in]dstBuffPtrDestination address, local memory of CPU
[in]numIterationsNumber of iterations, (number of HWA loops)
[in]chainEnabletrue: chaining enabled to the input EDMA. This mode is used for azimuth heatmap, false: chaining disabled.
Return values
EDMAerror code, see EDMA API.

Definition at line 1738 of file aoaprochwa.c.

int32_t AoAProcHWA_dataPathConfigHwaAoa ( HWA_Handle  hwaHandle,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *  res,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *  DPParams,
uint32_t  numObjOut,
uint32_t  hwaMemBankAddr[4] 
)

Description
The funciton configures HWA for angle (azimuth/elevation) estimation. It configures one HWA Param set when only azimuth antennas are used, or three Param sets when azimuth+elevation antennas are used. It also configures the HWA common register.

Parameters
[in]hwaHandleHWA handle
[in]resPointer to hardware resources structure
[in]DPParamsData path parameters
[in]numObjOutNumber of detected objects
[in]hwaMemBankAddrAddresses of HWA memory banks
Return values
Success- 0
Errorcode - <0

)

Description

[in,out]waitTimeLocalCPU waiting time
Return values

Definition at line 1608 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static void AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation ( cmplx16ImRe_t *  rxChComp,
uint32_t  numObj,
uint32_t  numAnt,
cmplx16ImRe_t *  symbolsIn,
cmplx16ImRe_t *  symbolsOut 
)
static

Description
AoAProcHWA Rx channel phase/gain compensation. The function performs phase/gain compensation on the Rx virtual antenna symbols of the detected object. The function is also used to perform the phase/gain compensation on the two dimensional array of only azimuth antennas which is used for the azimuth heat map display on the host. In this case the two dimensional array is laid out as X[number of range bins][number of azimuth antennas].

Parameters
[in]rxChCompRx channel phase/gain compensation coefficients
[in]numObjNumber of detected points
[in]numAntnumber of antennas
[in]symbolsInPointer to array of input symbols
[out]symbolsOutPointer to array of output symbols
Returns
void

Definition at line 177 of file aoaprochwa.c.

uint32_t  srcBuffAddr 
)
static

Description
The function is called during the single bin 2D-FFT calculation in the loop for every detected point to set the EDMA source address pointing to 1D-FFT symbols in the radar cube matrix at the object range bin.

Parameters
[in]resPointer to hardware resources structure
[in]srcBuffAddrAddress of the 1D-FFT radar cube matrix pointing to desired range bin of 1D-FFT antenna symbols
Return values
Success- 0
EDMAError code - <0

Definition at line 454 of file aoaprochwa.c.

uint32_t AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation ( uint16_t *  azimFFTPtr,
uint16_t *  elevFFTPtr,
AOAHwaObj *  aoaHwaObj,
uint32_t  objOutIdx,
uint32_t  objInIdx,
uint32_t  objInHwaIdx,
uint32_t  maxIdx,
uint32_t  peakVal 
)

Description
This function is called per object and it calculates its x/y/z coordinates based on Azimuth FFT output. It stores the coordinates to the output list of type DPIF_PointCloudCartesian_t and it also calculates object's SNR and the noise level and writes into the side information list of type DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo_t

Parameters
[in]azimFFTPtrPointer to the FFT complex output of azimuth antennas
[in]elevFFTPtrPointer to the FFT complex output of elevation antennas
[in]aoaHwaObjPointer to AoA DPU internal object
[in]objOutIdxIndex of the current object in the output lists DPIF_PointCloudCartesian_t and DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo_t
[in]objInIdxIndex of the current object in CFAR output list DPIF_CFARDetList_t
[in]objInHwaIdxIndex of the current object angle FFT data in HWA memory
[in]maxIdxPeak position in the FFT output of azimuth antennas
[in]peakValValue of the FFT output of azimuth antennas
Return values
objOutIdxIndex for the next object in the output list

static void AOAProcHWADoneIsrCallback ( void *  arg)
static

Description
HWA processing completion call back function as per HWA API. Depending on the programmed transfer completion codes, posts HWA done semaphore.

Parameters
[in]argArgument to the callback function
Return values

Definition at line 805 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static int32_t HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuthElevation ( HWA_Handle  hwaHandle,
uint8_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  numVirtualAntAzim,
uint32_t  numVirtualAntElev,
uint32_t  fftOutSize,
uint32_t  numIter,
uint16_t  hwaSourceBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset 
)
static

Description
This function configures three HWA Param sets to calculate azimuth FFTs on a set of detected objects. It is used when both azimuth and elevation antennas are enabled. The param sets are programmed to compute: a) FFT on azimuth antennas, log2 magnitude outputs, b) FFT on azimuth antennas, complex symbol outputs, c) FFT on elevation antennas, complex symbol outputs.

Parameters
[in]hwaHandleHWA handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameters starting index
[in]numVirtualAntAzimNumber of azimuth antennas
[in]numVirtualAntElevNumber of elevation antennas
[in]fftOutSizeAzimuth FFT size
[in]numIterNumber of iterations (number of detected objects)
[in]hwaSourceBufOffsetInput starting address of azimuth antennas
[out]hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffsetOutput starting address of azimuth antennas, log2 magnitudes
[out]hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffsetOutput starting address of azimuth antennas, complex values
[out]hwaDestElevCplxBufOffsetOutput starting address of elevation antennas, complex values
Return values
Success- 0
Errorcode - <0

Definition at line 892 of file aoaprochwa.c.

static int32_t HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin ( HWA_Handle  hwaHandle,
uint8_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  numDopplerChirps,
uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
uint32_t  numOutSamplesPerFft,
uint8_t  numRxAnt,
uint8_t  numTxAntIn,
uint8_t  numTxAntOut,
uint32_t  windowOffset,
uint8_t  winSym,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSource,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerDest,
uint16_t  hwaMemAzimSource,
uint16_t  hwaMemAzimDest 
)
static

Description
The function configures HWA Param sets for 2D-FFT single range bin calculation on 1D-FFT data from radarCube. The 1D FFT symbols are arranged in HWA memory as three dimensional array as X[Number of Tx antennas][Number of virtual chirps][Number of Rx antennas] THe output symbols are arrange as three dimensional array as Y[Number of Doppler bins][Number of Tx antnnas][Number of Rx antennas]

Parameters
[in]hwaHandleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numDopplerChirpsNumber of Doppler Chirps
[in]numDopplerBinsNumber of Doppler bins
[in]numOutSamplesPerFftNumber of output samples to generate from Doppler FFT size
[in]numRxAntNumber of Rx antennas
[in]numTxAntInNumber of Tx antennas
[in]numTxAntOutNumber of Rx antennas sets pulled output
[in]windowOffsetStarting address of the FFT window in HWA RAM
[in]winSymFlag to indicate if HWA windowing is symmetric see HWA_WINDOW_SYMM definitions in HWA driver's doxygen documentation
[in]dmaTriggerSourceDMA trigger source channel
[in]dmaTriggerDestDMA channel to trigger output EDMA to copy data out of HWA
[in]hwaMemAzimSourceHWA memory offset of the set of input symbols corresponding to one Tx antenna
[in]hwaMemAzimDestHWA memory offset of the set of output symbols corresponding to one Tx antnna
Return values
Success- 0
Errorcode - <0
